overview: This DVD contains “Ed Sullivan’s All-Star Comedy Special,” hosted by Mary Tyler Moore. Mary introduces classic stand-up appearances from The Ed Sullivan Show by legendary comedians George Carlin, Richard Pryor, Flip Wilson, Rodney Dangerfield, Jackie Mason, Henny Youngman, Jackie Vernon, Phyllis Diller, Bob Lewis, Alan King, Victor Borge, Joan Rivers, Carol Burnett, Milton Berle, and many others! Specifications Originally aired on CBS in 1995. Running time: 52 minutes. This disc is playable on all REGION 1 NTSC Compatible or Multi-Region / Dezoned DVD Players Standard Full Frame English Color and black & white
title: Ed Sullivan All-Star Comedy Special
